head.title: 1927 New York Yankees Schedule | Baseball-Reference.com

meta.content: View the 1927 New York Yankees Schedule on Baseball-Reference.com. Including home and away games, results, and more.
meta.name: Description

meta.content: View the 1927 New York Yankees Schedule on Baseball-Reference.com. Including home and away games, results, and more.

img.alt: Baseball-Reference.com Logo & Link to home page

div.div:
You are here:
BR Home Page > Teams > Franchise Encyclopedia > 1927 Schedule

div.aria-label: Site Search for players, teams and sections

input.aria-label: Enter a player, team or section name
input.name: search

div.p:
Record: 110-44, Finished 1st
in
American League
(Schedule and Results)
Pythagorean W-L: 109-45, 975 Runs, 599 Runs Allowed
Manager: Miller Huggins (110-44)
Ballpark: Yankee Stadium I

Attendance: 1,164,015
(1st of 8)

Park Factors: (Over 100 favors batters, under 100 favors pitchers.)
Multi-year: Batting - 98, Pitching - 94
One-year: Batting - 102, Pitching - 95
Postseason:Won World Series (4-0) over Pittsburgh Pirates
div.button: More team info, park factors, postseason, & more

div.a: Support us without the ads? Go Ad-Free.

div.aria-label: Sections on this page and/or other pages related to this page

div.p: Batting
Pitching
Other
Want to know when we do something new? Around once a week we'll give you a quick update on all the things we've been up to. View a sample email.

p.a: Become a Sports Reference Power User

div.span: Height of bar is margin of victory • Mouseover bar for details • Click for box score • Grouped by Month

th.aria-label: Game Number Which game out of all played by this team.
th.data-tip:
Game Number
Which game out of all played by this team.

th.aria-label: A number in parentheses indicates which game of a doubleheader. Click dates for box scores of games or standings on this day.
th.data-tip:
A number in parentheses indicates which game of a doubleheader.
Click dates for box scores of games or standings on this day.

th.aria-label: Home or Away Game @ means it is an away game, blank means home.
th.data-tip:
Home or Away Game
@ means it is an away game, blank means home.

th.aria-label: Win/Loss/Tie -wo indicates it was a walkoff win or loss. May miss some of those pre-1973, and none before 1940.
th.data-tip:
Win/Loss/Tie
-wo indicates it was a walkoff win or loss. May miss some of those pre-1973, and none before 1940.

th.aria-label: Runs Scored
th.data-tip: Runs Scored/Allowed

th.aria-label: Runs Allowed
th.data-tip: Runs Allowed

th.aria-label: Innings Only shown if something other than 9 innings were played.
th.data-tip:
Innings
Only shown if something other than 9 innings were played.

th.aria-label: Win Loss Record Team’s overall record after this game.
th.data-tip:
Win Loss Record
Team’s overall record after this game.

th.aria-label: Games Back
th.data-tip:
Games Back of Division/League Leader
Computed as games over .500 of leader (W-L) minus games over .500 of team divided by two.
Typically computed at the end of play for a particular day.
Blank for 1st game of DH.

th.aria-label: Time of Game
th.data-tip: Time of Game

th.aria-label: Day or Night Game Determined by the start time of the game as stated by RetroSheet. We rely on their designation here.
th.data-tip:
Day or Night Game
Determined by the start time of the game as stated by RetroSheet.
We rely on their designation here.

th.aria-label: Attendance Typically, tickets sold in home games.
th.data-tip:
Attendance
Typically, tickets sold in home games.

th.aria-label: Win Loss Streak + means a winning streak, - means a losing streak.
th.data-tip:
Win Loss Streak
+ means a winning streak, - means a losing streak.

th.aria-label: Originally Scheduled Game DateIf this is a makeup game, the original game date. The reason for the reschedule is in parentheses.
th.data-tip:
Originally Scheduled Game Date
If this is a makeup game, the original game date. The reason for the reschedule is in parentheses.

AL Central: Chicago White Sox, Cleveland Indians, Detroit Tigers, Kansas City Royals, Minnesota Twins

div.p: All logos are the trademark & property of their owners and not Sports Reference LLC. We present them here for purely educational purposes. Our reasoning for presenting offensive logos.
Logos were compiled by the amazing SportsLogos.net.
Copyright © 2000-2019 Sports Reference LLC. All rights reserved.
Much of the play-by-play, game results, and transaction information both shown and used to create certain data sets was obtained free of charge from and is copyrighted by RetroSheet.
Win Expectancy, Run Expectancy, and Leverage Index calculations provided by Tom Tango of InsideTheBook.com, and co-author of The Book: Playing the Percentages in Baseball.
Total Zone Rating and initial framework for Wins above Replacement calculations provided by Sean Smith.
Full-year historical Major League statistics provided by Pete Palmer and Gary Gillette of Hidden Game Sports.
Some defensive statistics Copyright © Baseball Info Solutions, 2010-2019.
Some high school data is courtesy David McWater.
Many historical player head shots courtesy of David Davis. Many thanks to him. All images are property the copyright holder and are displayed here for informational purposes only.
